name: Unblock Car - Around The World
description:
Unblock Car - Around The World is most popular and addictive sliding block puzzle game. The goal of this game is to solve the traffic jam in the car parking by moving the red car out of the chaos.

Designed to develop sequential-thinking for impulsive brains, we offered more than 1,000 puzzles for you to clash. However the cars and trucks obstruct the path which makes the puzzle harder.

HOW TO PLAY:
You need to get the Red Car out the Exit Gate. To accomplish, just move the blocking vehicles out of the way.
1. Drag the objects to create a gap.
2. Move the red car through the puzzle.
3. Less moves to win more stars.

FEATURES
- 5 world with 1,000 puzzles and 3 difficulty levels.
- Play for all ages
- Game is free
- Hint/Reset buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
- Great graphics and music.
- Background music and sounds

What are you waiting for? Download Unblock Car - Around The World now.
Don't forget to rate and review to help us!
